title: News reports from France. [No. 72/82] = Chroniques de France
brief_description: Cinemagazine: 1. Les Ballets Blaska - A young, up-and-coming ballet troupe. 2. Dubuffet’s practicables - Now 70, he was a wine merchant before becoming a well-known painter. 3. Marionettes - Jean-Lou Temporal’s striking creations. 4. Francois Cevert - One of France’s best Formula 1 racing-car drivers.
